results.name: Triangular array giving means of two odd primes: T(n,k) = (n-th prime + k-th prime)/2, n >= k >= 2.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, First 125 rows of triangle, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to Goldbach conjecture
xref: a(n, k) = A065342(n, k)/2 [but note different offsets]
Cf. A098090 (left edge), A065091 (right edge), A000040.
results.author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Oct 29 2001
